troubleshooting.title: Too many nested apply-templates calls Error When Running a Transformation

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I'm getting the error message Too many nested apply-templates calls when I try to transform my DocBook file to HTML using default DocBook to HTML transformation scenario.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Most likely, this is the result of a masked stack overflow error.

steps-informal.p: Try setting a new VM option with the value -Xss4m. You can also try to slowly increase this to larger values (e.g. -Xss5m or -Xss6m). Note that this consumes memory on a per thread basis ( can have tens of threads), so using a very large value here can backfire and leave without memory.
